DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= Action name = PCK.AUTOMIC_UIPATH.PUB.ACTION.GET_ENVIRONMENTS
= General description = This action fetches all the Environments Details defined in UiPath Orchestrator.
= Failure Conditions = (none)
= Inputs = - Environment Name: Provide the name of the environment. E.g. Development - Properties: Provide the list of properties as comma separated to include in the response. E.g. Name,Id,Description - Filter: Provide filters to be applied for the results, based on a Boolean condition. E.g. Name eq 'SalesProcess' - Order By: Specify the property to be used for ordering. E.g. Id desc - Top: Specify if the result should include only the first N items. E.g. 5 - Skip: Specify if the result should skip the first N items. E.g. 2 - Include Count: Specify whether if the count of the matching results should be included in the response. E.g. No - Expand: Provide related entities to be inlined. E.g. Robots
= Behavior = * Input for the Top field should be numeric and greater than 0. * The action consider the environment count up to 30 only for UC4RB_UIP_ENV_ID_COUNT variable, more than 30 records will be ignored.
= Return Value = UC4RB_UIP_ENV_ID_LIST: List of Environments IDs UC4RB_UIP_ENV_ID_COUNT: Count of Environments
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 in case of success. * Return code is non-zero in case of failure.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = AE logs will be displayed in the AE report.
= Example = - Environment Name: testEnv - Properties: Id, Name,Description - Filter: Type eq 'Dev' - Order By: Name desc - Top: 2 - Skip: 1 - Include Count: No - Expand: Robots
